item.title: From Concept to Chatbot: ServiceNow with Copilot Studio Intro
item.description: ServiceNow is a behemoth of a product, but it also has a robust API which means that we can suck it into our clutches… I mean, ingest its data into our M365 ecosystem for a more seamless experience for our users. I knew all of this, but then I saw this amazing video from Dewain Robinson here, and when I say it got me started, I mean it gave me the use case, showed me the basics of interacting with Copilot Studio, and inspired me to keep building on that use case to make my own Copilot Studio ServiceNow bot.
